caption: Amazing place for toddlers when it rains ! The place is big enough with lots of activities.
Nice place to walk with kids. Always some fancy interactive activities.

The LEGO space, although slightly renovated and reorganized, has lost its simplicity and sympathy. We are now refused entry in a way that borders on refusing entry to a poor quality nightclub, then having people enter right after us, tough for our 3 year old child. Unlimited access on site by maintaining a gauge no longer allows as many passages. We appreciated the little fun breaks in this place in the middle of our walks in the park, too bad.

It's a huge park including little Villette for children. When the weather is nice, it's nice to go for a walk and have a picnic. When it rains, you can stay inside for a movie and science.  You can also find educational gifts.  You have to buy a ticket for each floor (program), otherwise not even the right of access.  There are free programs during school holidays.  There is a €1 coin locker to store your belongings.  Unfortunately the toilets are dirty.

Great place for young and old and especially families. There is a large space inside with several games and workshops offered, including a “construction game” area and also a board game. It’s a beautiful library and the staff is great.

#Impossibility of reserving places for the city of babies  I've been trying to reserve a place for myself and my little girl at the city of babies for a week. Slots which display not full are not reservable. There is always a problem "maximum quantity reached" for places (my little girl is going to go alone??!), "error occurred when adding to cart". I have already written an email to report this. It's impossible to book other than via the internet, only via the internet it doesn't work. It's really frustrating and wastes time and energy. !!! It's really regrettable.
It is a place that offers different activities for the family or during school outings.  This place is located in the Parc de la Villette.

The space is very pleasant, and the team is extremely friendly and helpful. We spend there almost every weekend, especially for the little ones. In addition, the establishment regularly offers free workshops such as baby gym, which is a real plus. I highly recommend this place.

Lego workshop: the security guard tells us go ahead, you can enter. We enter and wait for the host at the entrance. She arrives and without saying hello, I didn't tell you to come in. When we tell her that her colleague told us to come in, she tells us no, no. We tell her yes yes and she replies well I didn't tell you to come in. Faced with this welcome we decided to leave. When we welcome the public and also children, a minimum of politeness and sympathy is necessary...

I went there two weeks ago and I highly recommend it. Super nice place. Children can play different games with free access: Lego, kapla, dinette, board games, reading corner... There is also a collective activities and cinema area which we did not try. Very friendly, welcoming, smiling staff.
Good activity program. Games available for free access.  Kind welcome. Sometimes a very busy place, therefore lively and a little noisy.
Really disappointing. Nevertheless, a very friendly welcome. Three legos and a dinette fighting a duel in the middle of a large austere room, you might as well stay at home...
A great place for children, from 18 months, with free little activities and paid educational activities.

Scandalous! The lady who was in charge of the kite workshop this Sunday July 4 should not work with children!! At reception, the hostess registered my 4-year-old daughter for the workshop, telling me that I should help her because the minimum age was 5 years old. When we arrived at the workshop, without any pity or tact in front of all the children, the facilitator failed us, leaving my daughter disappointed and in tears. When we work with children of this age, we make a minimum of effort to learn to speak to them and explain things to them educationally. I don't see why it was awkward to let her try... We were then directed to a paper flower workshop which lasted 2 minutes then we went to the “cinema” projection room where the cartoon did not start… in short, a 35 minute drive for a total disappointment!
Very welcoming place to play and occupy our child. There are books, toys, board games, a projection space, dinette, etc.

Excellent moment of discovery for my cm1-cm2 students in the stop motion workshop led by Jade who delivered! The workshop is both theoretical and fun, calm time around viewing extracts from animated films and creating their own stop motion. Jade is a pro! Thanks again to her!

Very nice initiative. The staff is extremely friendly and smiling (visit on December 29, 2019) I deplore the absence of a place dedicated to snacks, we had to make the children eat on the terrace in this cold which was very unpleasant.
Excellent place for all families looking to have fun and have fun!

At the Paul Delouvrier pavilion, there is a new little villette space which welcomes children from 2 years old. Perfect for having a free play area with construction games, coloring and board games, a reading corner. You can also register for workshops during the year.
A space reserved for children, with a very friendly welcome, where you can enjoy a quiet moment after a visit to the neighboring exhibition.
We found ourselves there by chance with my 7 year old boy and what a surprise! Self-service board game, reading corner, Lego workshop.....a sharing space in an attractive place for children!
Super nice monster coloring space, a little movie session on shapes and a playmobile exhibition. My children are beyond happy!
Very interesting exhibition, would deserve more detail on the names of the clouds, but very educational thank you
Superb structure which offers workshops every weekend
A place where adults become children again. Experiences and curiosities of all kinds.
Very nice place. Free and full of entertainment, in the heart of La Villette.
The ideal place for children to have a great time!
very beautiful place just a shame the circus workshop is almost never open to the public
Nice place for little ones. Different play areas. Pleasant. A little noisy of course...
Top, motivated animation team, suitable premises, great workshops. I highly recommend. Top for young children.
We were very well received, my daughter and I had a great time! We will come back
Great free activities for the whole family
Very nice place with great workshops for the family and for children
Dinner at the smiile vegan pop festival 2020... Great chefs, very good atmosphere, perfect.
Adorable ! free. Many small activities offered
Your children will love it! A good time to spend and discover.
Very nice intervention for the children
Great for kids with free activities
